question: You work for an international company and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another companyWrite a letter to your manager. In your letter:-	Explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months -	Say how your work could be done while you are away -	Ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: To solve the problem that appeared recently related with the booming sales performance, I would like to return to our headquarter for some help

During this time, I will take a lot of courses that are set for new managers like me. The aims are to improve our managing skills and teach us some new concepts which can help us break the bottleneck.

During my absence here, I will arrange my work through the internet. The clients of mine will transfer to Johnson who will assist me to maintain the client relationships. Besides, regular meetings will be launched by me to review the work outcome using the video meeting. I will make sure that the operation of our sales department will not be affected.
I am very pleased that if you can approve it and help me to create such a chance. If you see my letter for you , I am looking forward to hearing your reply. Thank you!
